meanings.sent1: After hours of non-stop studying, I felt completely outburnt.
meanings.sent2: The candle slowly outburnt until it flickered out.
meanings.sent3: The campfire outburnt all the wood we had gathered in just a few hours.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for the project outburnt all obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent5: The wildfire outburnt everything in its path, leaving only ashes behind.

meanings.sent1: The outburnt lightbulb needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent2: The outburnt engine sputtered to a stop.
meanings.sent3: The outburnt toast set off the smoke alarm in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The outburnt forest was a stark reminder of the dangers of wildfires.
meanings.sent5: The outburnt ruins of the old building stood as a testament to its former glory.
